=================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.contenttypes.views


Functions

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.contenttypes.views.shortcut


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: shortcut(request, content_type_id, object_id)

   Redirect to an object's page based on a content-type ID and an object ID.
